name: Manas Kaul
description: I'm a Full-Stack Engineer at XPO, where I build dynamic web applications using Angular and TypeScript and robust and reliable backend systems using Java. I have a Bachelor of Technology degree in Computer Science from Dhirubhai Ambani Institute of Information and Communication Technology (DAIICT), one of the top engineering colleges in India.

subsection.heading: XPO, Inc
description: Experience developing end-to-end applications from the ground up, resulting in smooth development-to-production releases.
Improved user experience in existing applications, as well as the migration of legacy systems to newer technology and standards.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time and under budget.
All the efforts led to a yearly revenue savings surpassing $20 million.
Awarded XPO Super-Star and XPO Employee of the Quater.
Spearheaded legacy application migration , overseeing the entire code base.
Led a team of 3, ensuring adherence to best practices and coding standards and achieving dev-to-deploy from scratch.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time and under budget.
Engaged in ongoing discussions with shareholders to ensure alignment between development efforts and evolving project objectives.

subsection.heading: DA-IICT, Gujarat
description: B. Tech in Computer Science & Engineering
